subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The new team founded by Gene Haas, a co-owner of the Stewart-Haas Nascar team, would be the first based in the United States since 1976.
snippet: The new team founded by Gene Haas, a co-owner of the Stewart-Haas Nascar team, would be the first based in the United States since 1976.
